image.title: Empathy Studios Logo
image.caption: Final logo design for the studio I was a part of in CSC482. Created using Adobe Illustrator and GIMP.

image.title: CSC482 T-Shirt
image.caption: Front and back of the t-shirt for Adv Game Projects, featuring both teams. Created using Adobe Illustrator and GIMP.

image.title: Rosie the WiCS-iter
image.caption: Original sketch by Monica Poletti. Redrawn and colored and use for t-shirts and other swag. Created using Inkscape.

image.title: STARS
image.caption: Designed shirt for STARS SLC members using Inkscape and GIMP. Front and back.

image.title: DiamondHacks
image.caption: Created logo in GIMP and redesigned website: www.ncsudiamondhacks.com

image.title: LadyWolf CSC Secrets T-Shirt
image.caption: Recreated the binary wolf I used in the STARS shirt for a joint WiCS and STARS event. Created in Adobe Illustrator.
